Posts.Content: Dec 31, 2009 06:06PM kittygriffin wrote: I just come through the waiting stage and was diagnosed yesterday wit BC. Im 41 years old and totally freaked. I just avoided the BC stuff completly and i am treated for anxiety disorder too.I thought the week went well considering the facts your dealing with . just hang in there it will be here before you know it. Good luck!!
